amendment.description: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to clarify provisions relating to overtime pay.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3111 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 78.

action.text: Amendment SA 3111 proposed by Senator Gregg. (consideration: CR S4790-4793, S4806; text: CR S4792-4793) To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to clarify provisions relating to overtime pay.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3111 proposed by Senator Gregg.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3111 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 78.
